Open packages and get random gifts.
en.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: Welcome! Are you ready to discover the power of words?
en.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Now, let me explain some of the things you can do.
en.You must find the words in the categorie: You must find the words in the categories to help complete the rooms of the wizarding school.
en.You will constantly receive random tasks: You will constantly receive random tasks. Complete the tasks and earn rewards by finding words that contain the specified letter.
en.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: You earn 2 stars for completing each level. Collect all the stars to unlock rewards.
en.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Collect your rewards at regular intervals!
en.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Solve the fun puzzles. They help you earn rewards.
en.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewards!
en.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: Let's try building a fountain in the schoolyard!
en.At the end of each level, you have a cha: At the end of each level, you have a chance to win cards. Complete collections with these cards and earn rewards.
You need to cross out the word you find. Be careful, words can be in 4 different directions!
en.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: You can use the diamonds you earn at the end of each level to place items in the rooms.

Paketleri aç ve rastgele hediyeler kazan.
tr.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: Hoş geldin! Kelimelerin gücünü keşfetmeye hazır mısın?
tr.You must find the words in the categorie: Büyücülük okulunun odalarını tamamlamaya yardımcı olmak için kategorilerdeki kelimeleri bulmalısın.
tr.You will constantly receive random tasks: Sürekli olarak rastgele görevler alacaksın. Belirtilen harfi içeren kelimeleri bularak görevleri tamamla ve ödüller kazan.
tr.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Her seviyeyi tamamladığında 2 yıldız kazanırsın. Ödüllerin kilidini açmak için tüm yıldızları topla.
tr.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Eğlenceli bulmacaları çöz. Bunlar sana ödüller kazandırır.
tr.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: Okulun avlusunda bir çeşme yapmayı deneyelim!
tr.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Her seviyenin sonunda kart kazanma şansın var. Bu kartlarla koleksiyonları tamamlayarak ödüller kazan.
Bulduğun kelimenin üzerini çizmen gerekiyor. Dikkat et, kelimeler 4 farklı yönde olabilir!
tr.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: Her seviyenin sonunda kazandığınız elmasları, odalara eşyalar yerleştirmek için kullanabilirsiniz.

Ouvre les paquets et reçois des cadeaux aléatoires.
fr.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: Bienvenue ! Êtes-vous prêt à découvrir le pouvoir des mots ?
fr.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Maintenant, laissez-moi vous expliquer certaines choses que vous pouvez faire.
fr.You must find the words in the categorie: Vous devez trouver les mots dans les catégories pour aider à compléter les salles de l’école de sorcellerie.
fr.You will constantly receive random tasks: Vous recevrez constamment des tâches aléatoires. Remplissez-les et gagnez des récompenses en trouvant des mots contenant la lettre spécifiée.
fr.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Vous gagnez 2 étoiles pour chaque niveau terminé. Collectez toutes les étoiles pour déverrouiller des récompenses.
fr.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Collectez vos récompenses à intervalles réguliers !
fr.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Résolvez les puzzles amusants. Ils vous aident à gagner des récompenses.
fr.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: N'oubliez pas la roue avec des récompenses incroyables !
fr.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: Essayons de construire une fontaine dans la cour de l'école !
fr.At the end of each level, you have a cha: À la fin de chaque niveau, vous avez une chance de gagner des cartes. Complétez des collections avec ces cartes et gagnez des récompenses.
Vous devez rayer le mot que vous trouvez. Attention, les mots peuvent apparaître dans 4 directions différentes !
fr.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: Vous pouvez utiliser les diamants que vous gagnez à la fin de chaque niveau pour placer des objets dans les pièces.

Apri i pacchi e ottieni regali casuali.
it.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: Benvenuto! Sei pronto a scoprire il potere delle parole?
it.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Ora, lasciami spiegarti alcune delle cose che puoi fare.
it.You must find the words in the categorie: Devi trovare le parole nelle categorie per aiutare a completare le stanze della scuola di magia.
it.You will constantly receive random tasks: Riceverai costantemente compiti casuali. Completali e guadagna ricompense trovando parole che contengono la lettera specificata.
it.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Ottieni 2 stelle per ogni livello completato. Raccogli tutte le stelle per sbloccare ricompense.
it.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Raccogli le tue ricompense a intervalli regolari!
it.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Risolvi i puzzle divertenti. Ti aiutano a guadagnare ricompense.
it.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Non dimenticare la ruota con ricompense incredibili!
it.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: Proviamo a costruire una fontana nel cortile della scuola!
it.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Alla fine di ogni livello, hai la possibilità di vincere carte. Completa le collezioni con queste carte e ottieni ricompense.
Devi barrare la parola che trovi. Fai attenzione, le parole possono essere in 4 direzioni diverse!
it.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: Puoi usare i diamanti che guadagni alla fine di ogni livello per posizionare gli oggetti nelle stanze.

Öffne Pakete und erhalte zufällige Geschenke.
de.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: Willkommen! Bist du bereit, die Kraft der Worte zu entdecken?
de.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Jetzt lass mich dir einige Dinge erklären, die du tun kannst.
de.You must find the words in the categorie: Du musst die Wörter in den Kategorien finden, um die Räume der Zauberschule zu vervollständigen.
de.You will constantly receive random tasks: Du erhältst ständig zufällige Aufgaben. Erledige die Aufgaben und erhalte Belohnungen, indem du Wörter findest, die den angegebenen Buchstaben enthalten.
de.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Du bekommst 2 Sterne für das Abschließen jedes Levels. Sammle alle Sterne, um Belohnungen freizuschalten.
de.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Sammle deine Belohnungen in regelmäßigen Abständen ein!
de.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Löse die lustigen Rätsel. Sie helfen dir, Belohnungen zu verdienen.
de.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Vergiss nicht das Rad mit fantastischen Gewinnen!
de.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: Lass uns versuchen, einen Brunnen im Schulhof zu bauen!
de.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Am Ende jedes Levels hast du die Chance, Karten zu gewinnen. Vervollständige mit diesen Karten Sammlungen und erhalte Belohnungen.
de.Let's play the first level!: Lass uns das erste Level spielen!
Du musst das gefundene Wort durchstreichen. Vorsicht, die Wörter können in 4 verschiedene Richtungen verlaufen!
de.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: Du kannst die Diamanten, die du am Ende jedes Levels erhältst, verwenden, um Gegenstände in den Räumen zu platzieren.

Abre paquetes y recibe regalos aleatorios.
es.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: ¡Bienvenido! ¿Estás listo para descubrir el poder de las palabras?
es.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Ahora, déjame explicarte algunas de las cosas que puedes hacer.
es.You must find the words in the categorie: Debes encontrar las palabras en las categorías para ayudar a completar las salas de la escuela de magia.
es.You will constantly receive random tasks: Recibirás constantemente tareas aleatorias. Complétalas y gana recompensas encontrando palabras que contengan la letra especificada.
es.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Ganas 2 estrellas por completar cada nivel. ¡Reúne todas las estrellas para desbloquear recompensas!
es.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Resuelve los acertijos divertidos. Te ayudarán a ganar recompensas.
es.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: ¡No olvides la ruleta con recompensas increíbles!
es.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: ¡Intentemos construir una fuente en el patio de la escuela!
es.At the end of each level, you have a cha: Al final de cada nivel, tienes la oportunidad de ganar cartas. Completa colecciones con estas cartas y gana recompensas.
Necesitas tachar la palabra que encuentres. ¡Ten cuidado, las palabras pueden estar en 4 direcciones diferentes!
es.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: Puedes usar los diamantes que ganas al final de cada nivel para colocar objetos en las salas.

Abra pacotes e receba presentes aleatórios.
pt.Welcome! Are you ready to discover the p: Bem-vindo! Você está pronto para descobrir o poder das palavras?
pt.Now, let me explain some of the things y: Agora, deixe-me explicar algumas das coisas que você pode fazer.
pt.You must find the words in the categorie: Você deve encontrar as palavras nas categorias para ajudar a completar as salas da escola de magia.
pt.You will constantly receive random tasks: Você receberá constantemente tarefas aleatórias. Conclua as tarefas e ganhe recompensas encontrando palavras que contenham a letra especificada.
pt.You earn 2 stars for completing each lev: Você ganha 2 estrelas por completar cada nível. Colete todas as estrelas para desbloquear recompensas.
pt.Collect your rewards at regular interval: Colete suas recompensas em intervalos regulares!
pt.Solve the fun puzzles. They help you ear: Resolva os quebra-cabeças divertidos. Eles ajudam você a ganhar recompensas.
pt.Don't forget the wheel with amazing rewa: Não se esqueça da roleta com recompensas incríveis!
pt.Let's try building a fountain in the sch: Vamos tentar construir uma fonte no pátio da escola!
pt.At the end of each level, you have a cha: No final de cada nível, você tem a chance de ganhar cartas. Complete coleções com essas cartas e ganhe recompensas.
Você precisa riscar a palavra que encontrar. Tome cuidado, as palavras podem estar em 4 direções diferentes!
pt.You can use the diamonds you earn at the: Você pode usar os diamantes que ganha ao final de cada nível para colocar itens nos quartos.
